job description:
Job Description

This position focuses on acquiring, summarizing, and analyzing data related to functions of the institution in support of internal and external requests and requirements including state and federal reporting. Key responsibilities include management of certain aspects of key reporting functions to state, federal and private agencies, and the collaboration with groups and individuals both inside and outside the Office of Institutional Research on projects to enhance institutional effectiveness.

Qualifications:

At a minimum the position requires a experience in a quantitative field and fluid knowledge of data acquisition and analysis tools employed to extract and analyze data from relational databases. The employee should have a demonstrated ability to independently conduct research projects involved with the analysis of academic data and effectively communicate the results both in written and oral form. The employee should have a demonstrated ability to work in a team environment
